node.detail_zh: 女患者為第 #46 宗個案患者的小姨，過往健康良好，平日居於鰂魚涌康景花園，周末則居於兒子位於灣仔柯布連道 28 - 32 號香海大廈的寓所。她於 1 月 31 日出現咳嗽， 2 月 1 日開始發燒及發冷。她分別於 1 月 31 日、2 月 3 日及 7 日向私家醫生求診， 2 月 12 日到律敦治醫院求醫並入院接受治療。
node.detail_en: The female patient is the younger sister-in-law of the 75-year-old male patient of the 46th case, has good past health. She lives at Mount Parker Lodge in Quarry Bay on weekdays and stays with her son at Heung Hoi Mansion on 28-32 O’Brien Road in Wan Chai on weekends. She developed cough on Jan 31 and then fever and chills since Feb 1. She consulted private doctors on Jan 31, Feb 3 and 7. She then sought treatment from Ruttonjee Hospital on Feb 12 where she was admitted for treatment.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 有居於 A07 室住戶先後確診，懷疑病毒經損毀的排污渠管系統傳播。衞生署一度撤離大廈 A07 室住戶接受隔離。食環署消毒涉及單位及房署檢查單位喉管後，居民獲安排返回居所。
groups.description_en: Some residents of the flats A07 across various floors of Hong Mei House (C H Estate, Tsing Yi) were diagnosed, hence leading to to suspicion of sewer leakage. Over a hundred residents of flats A07 were transferred to quarantine centre(s?). Residents were allowed to return home after FEHD sterilized the flats in question and confirmed that the sewer system is intact.

node.location_zh: 康柏徑 10 號康景花園 D 座
node.location_en: Block D, Mount Parker Lodge, 10 Hong Pak Path

node.location_zh: 柯布連道 28-32 號香海大廈
